content: cloud yarn cowl a pattern by melissafleur hughes copyright 2025 overview this cosy cowl is quick to make and uses back loop single_crochet stitches to provide texture the cowls starts with a chain of 32 stitches this can be increased or decreased in a multiple of any number to make a wider or narrower cowl crochet terminology is in us terminology and there is a stitch glossary on the last page of this pattern a 32 stitch chain will make a cowl that is 30- 38cm wide and 20 cm high this is a big snuggly cowl yarn and notions 1 ball 150g super bulky rope white gum wool yarn a crochet hook in the range of 15mm to 25mm 15mm for a dense fabric and 25mm for a soft draping fabric i prefer the 20mm hook for ease of use and a soft cowl examples of the results of the three hooks are displayed below optional a small crochet hook to weave-in the ends the blue/violet /grey colour-way shown in this pattern is thundercloud from changelingcolouredyarns 15 mm hook 20 mm hook 25mm hook foundation row chain 32 approximately 55 to 75 cm long join with a slip_stitch i suggest laying the chain out on a table to join to ensure it is not twisted row 1 continuing in the round single_crochet single_crochet in each stitch don t join this row but instead continue in a spiral to the last row 32 single_crochet 2 back loop stitches row 2 and all the following row are made in the back loops of the stitches previous row in a standard single_crochet stitch you place you hook thru both loops of the stitch in the previous row in a back loop single_crochet blsc place you hook thru only one of those loops the loop on the inside or back of your cowl row 2 continuing in the round back loop single_crochet blsc in each stitch to end of row 32blsc continue repeating row 2 until the desired height or there is only 60cm yarn remaining this is about 5 more row finishing the cowl make a back loop slip_stitch blss in the next 6 stitches fasten_off weave the ends into the inside of the cowl with a small crochet hook or your fingers for questions with this pattern please reach out to melissa on facebook or email as changelingcolouredyarns and changelingcolouredyarns@gmail com videos for this cowl can be found on my youtube channel ccy-changelingcolouredyarns the playlist for this cowl is https //youtube com/playlist list=pl2c4dvqvwfird-ix5w7zf8- xvhwyaemk1&si=uhvi4y3qqkvj18_t 3 stitch glossary front loop and back loop front loop fl crochet stitch just insert the hook into the front loop of the previous stitch this is the side closest to you so when you turn your work it changes back loop bl a crochet stitch into the back loop of the previous stitch such as blsc is a single_crochet into the back loop abbreviation name details chain chain yarn over hook pull through 1 one loop
